items.title: Microsoft Updates Azure Mobile Apps, Ponders Future
items.description:
Microsoft recently released a new version of Azure Mobile Apps, which allows developers, including those on Xamarin, to have cloud-based back-ends for data storage, online/offline synch, authentication and more. It also now supports Xamarin.Essentials for authentication, winner!

The team have released a survey to help direct and potentially save the future of this service so its well worth taking a few minutes if you use it with your apps!

items.title: 5 Must Install NuGets for New Xamarin Projects
items.description:
Not 1 but 5!! Xamarin comes with some amazing features out of the box in it's own NuGet packages, but also with the included Xamarin.Essentials package for Forms projects, allowing you to access loads of native features from your shared code. But there are some amazing packages on top of that which can be great extras, I certainly install a few of these from James' list everytime I hit File -> New!
